onversation and don't get too 
breathless, unless you were 
already exercising hard before 
your pregnancy.
Don’t lie on your back for 
longer than a few minutes.
Avoid stomach crunches 
and sit-ups.
Gentle swimming, walking 
and dancing are great.
In the gym, cycling and 
rowing are gentle on 
your bump.
Listen to your body - if it 
feels good, keep it up; it is 
uncomfortable, stop and 
seek advice!
Exercising increases the blood ﬂow to the 
placenta. This is great for your baby’s growth
